extDesc.message: Open shortened URLs in a new tab
extDesc.description: Open shortened URLs in a new tab

context_menu_title.description: Text that will appear in context menu

resetToDefaultFailed.message: Oops! We're unable to reset user settings to default, please reload the page and try again.
resetToDefaultFailed.description: Error message displayed to user when an error occurs while resetting extension configs to default

resetToDefaultSuccess.message: Fresh slate! Your settings were reset to the application default
resetToDefaultSuccess.description: Message displayed to user when they successfully reset extension configs to default

saveUserSettingsFailed.message: Oops! We're unable to save your settings right now. Please reload the page and try again.
saveUserSettingsFailed.description: Error message displayed to user when an error occurs while saving extension configs

saveUserSettingsSuccess.message: Good to go! Your settings were saved successfully.
saveUserSettingsSuccess.description: Message displayed to user when their extension configs are saved successfully

restoreUserSettingsFailed.message: Oops! We're unable to restore your settings right now. Please reload the page and try again.
restoreUserSettingsFailed.description: Error message displayed to user when an error occurs while restoring extension configs

restoreUserSettingsSuccess.message: You're safe! Your settings were restored.
restoreUserSettingsSuccess.description: Message displayed to user when their extension configs are restored successfully

restoreUserSettingsSuccessNoUpdate.message: Your settings were restored successfully, but we couldn't update the page. Please reload this page.
restoreUserSettingsSuccessNoUpdate.description: Message displayed to user when their extension configs are restored successfully, but an error occurs while updating the page

optionsTitle.description: Title of Expand URL options page

applicationCreatedByText.message: This application was created by Fred Muya and released under the The MIT License (MIT)
applicationCreatedByText.description: Text showing who created the app

versionText.description: Text showing which version of the application is running

openingExpandedURLsContentHeader.message: Opening Expanded URLs   <small>Choose what happens when you click on Expand URL</small>
openingExpandedURLsContentHeader.description: Text for Opening Expanded URLs under Settings page

autoRedirectRadioLabel.message: Automatically open expanded URL in a new tab <title>Note: There might be a few seconds delay after clicking while we expand the URL</title>
autoRedirectRadioLabel.description: Text Automatically Redirect radio button label

previewURLRadioLabel.message: Preview the expanded URL in a new tab before opening it
previewURLRadioLabel.description: Text Preview URL radio button label

resetToDefaultModalHeader.description: Header for modal that comes up when you click on reset to default

resetToDefaultModalDialogText.message: Are you sure you want to reset all settings to the default? This action cannot be undone
resetToDefaultModalDialogText.description: Dialog text for modal that comes up when you click on reset to default

resetToDefaultModalRejectResetButton.description: Cancel Reset default Button text for modal that comes up when you click on reset to default

resetToDefaultModalAcceptResetButton.description: Accept Reset default Button text for modal that comes up when you click on reset to default

saveSettingsButton.description: Button text for Save option on settings page

discardSettingsButton.description: Button text for Discard Changes option on settings page

resetSettingsButton.description: Button text for Reset to default option on settings page

previewDefaultError.message: Sorry, an error occurred. Please try to open the shortened URL with Expand URL again.
previewDefaultError.description: Generic error for failures while trying to open shortened URL

unableToResolveUrl.message: Oops! We couldn't expand your URL. Please try again.
unableToResolveUrl.description: Error when we're unable to resolve the URL

unableToResolveUrlNoConn.message: Oops! We couldn't expand your URL. Please check your Internet connection and try again.
unableToResolveUrlNoConn.description: Error when we're unable to resolve the URL due to network error
